title: Mother Nature's Remedy
description: Carries raw and vegan superfood powdered supplements and superfoods such as quinoa and raw cacao, as well as bulk dried herbs and liquid tinctured herbal formulas. Also has many Chinese herbal formulas, body care items such as soaps, massage oils, essential oils, coconut oil and shea butter. Drinks include kombucha, coconut water, teas and elixers. Does carry some vegetarian items, in addition to vegan. Located in the front part of a store (has its own separate entrance) that also has a medical marijuana dispensary in the back portion.
